sil-desc: A [https://semantic-mediawiki.org Semantic MediaWiki] extension to create and manage interlanguage links.
sil-hideinterlanguagelinks: The parser function cannot be used because "wgHideInterlanguageLinks" is set.
sil-invalidlanguagecode: "$1" was not recognized as valid language code.
sil-parser-multiplecalls: The "INTERLANGUAGELINK" parser function was called muliple times on this page.
sil-languagetargetcombination-exists: The combination "$1":"$2" already exsits for page "$3" therefore no additional interlanguage annotation was created.
